name: Godville flat theme (dark)
description:
Flat theme for Godvillegame with smooth animations (dark).

* Smooth popup animation is available for the third eye, lab, last voices, ark and battle history.
* All main pages of the site are supported except encyclopedias, including the main, forum, etc.
* Don't conflict with Erinome Godville UI+.

Work in progress, message me if you find errors in the display.


Плоская тема для Годвилля с плавными анимациями (тёмная).

* Плавная анимация появления попапов доступна для третьего глаза, лаборатории, последних гласов, ковчега и истории сражений.
* Поддерживаются все основные страницы сайта кроме энциклобогии, в том числе главная, форум и пр.
* Не конфликтует с Erinome Godville UI+.

Работа над темой продолжается, пишите, если найдёте ошибки в отображении.


Light version: https://userstyles.org/styles/157529/godville-flat-theme-light
Source code: https://bitbucket.org/panyavkin/godville-flat-style
css:

.1s}html{background-color:#000;font-family:Ubuntu,sans-serif!important}html body{-webkit-animation-delay:350ms;animation-delay:350ms;-webkit-animation-duration:.1s;animation-duration:.1s;-webkit-animation-iteration-count:1;animation-iteration-count:1;-webkit-animation-name:smooth-show;animation-name:smooth-show;background:-webkit-radial-gradient(#000 110%);color:#bfbfbf;font-family:Ubuntu,sans-serif!important;line-height:1.3333;opacity:1;overflow-y:scroll!important;-webkit-animation-fill-mode:forwards;animation-fill-mode:forwards}@-webkit-keyframes smooth-show{0%{opacity:0}100%{opacity:1}}@keyframes smooth-show{0%{opacity:0}100%{opacity:1}}.div_link,.div_link_nu,a,a:link,a:visited{color:#198ec9!important;text-decoration:none;-webkit-transition:color ease 250ms;-o-transition:color ease 250ms;transition:color ease 250ms}.div_link:hover,.div_link_nu:hover,a:hover,a:link:hover,a:visited:hover{color:#32bbff!important;text-decoration:none}b,strong{font-weight:500}p{font-family:Ubuntu,sans-serif!important}code{font-family:Ubuntu,monospace!important}input,textarea{background-color:#454553!important;border:1px 250ms}input[type=submit]{background-color:#454553!important;border:1px solid #555;color:#bfbfbf;cursor:pointer;padding:5px 10px;-webkit-transition:opacity ease 250ms, border ease 250ms, color ease 250ms;-o-transition:opacity ease 250ms, border ease 250ms, color ease 250ms;transition:opacity ease 250ms, border ease 250ms, color ease 250ms}input[type=submit]:disabled{cursor:default;opacity:.4}input[type=submit]:disabled:hover{border:1px solid #555!important;color:#bfbfbf!important}input[type=submit]:hover{border:1px solid #32bbff!important;color:#32bbff!important}select{background-color:#454553!important;border-color:#555!important;color:#bfbfbf!important}h2,h3{color:#fff!important;font-weight:500}pre{background-color:#141418!important;border-color:#555!important;border-right:1px solid!important}blockquote{background-color:#2f3129!important;border-bottom-color:transparent!important;border-top-color:transparent!important}#menu_bar{background-color:#222229;border-bottom:1px solid #555;font-size:100%!important;left:0;padding:8px 0;position:absolute;top:0;white-space:nowrap;width:100%}#footer .columns{border-top:none}#footer .columns #menu_bar{background:0 0}#footer p{padding-top:2.5em!important}.t_award_small{border-radius:0;margin:0 5px}#arena_block .rpl,#ib_l2,#login_form .h_cell,#profile_main #central_block_my_page .bl_cell,#ui_help,.block,.tooltip{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,left bottom,color-stop(50%,#222229),color-stop(300%,#000))!important;background:-webkit-linear-gradient(#222229 50%,#000 300%)!important;background:-o-linear-gradient(#222229 50%,#000 300%)!important;background:linear-gradient(#222229 50%,#000 300%)!important;border:1px solid #555;border-radius:0!important;color:#bfbfbf;margin:10px 0 0;overflow:hidden;padding-top:10px}#gradient stop[offset="0.02"]{stop-color:#454553!important}#gradient stop[offset="0"]{stop-color:transparent!important;stop-opacity:0}.pr_bg,div.p_bar{background-color:#454553;border:none;border-radius:0!important;display:inline-block;float:none;outline:#555 solid 1px}.pr_bg:after,.pr_bg:before,div.p_bar:after,div.p_bar:before{background-color:#bfbfbf!important}.pr_bg div.p_val,div.p_bar div.p_val{border-radius:0!important}.pr_bg{height:8px!important;border:none}.pr_bg .pr_bar{background-color:#454553;height:8px!important;outline:#555 solid
